name: Flying Penguin (Hollow Neko)
description:
Just a rip-off of the well-known and yet dead game Flappy Bird.

It's my first time making a mobile game, so I decided to make a copy of, well, yeah, Flappy Bird. It has 9 skins (one of them is the Flappy boi) and not much more, really.

I planned to make 4 backgrounds, but I just want to get rid of this project to move into another one.

Well, hope you enjoy! o/

COMING SOON TO PLAY STORE
